name: MediaCommander
description: A powerful Red cog that integrates with the full Arr stack (Plex, Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr), Tautulli, Overseerr, and other media services. Provides role-based access for both server owners and users to manage media libraries, handle requests, monitor activity, and control access.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores server configuration, API keys, user mappings, and request history. No personal user data is shared with external services beyond what's necessary for media management functionality.
author: DevelopmentCats
